content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The Blarney Stone, from The New Adventures Of Sherlock Holmes this week. That story originally aired March 18, 1946.

(30:10) Our second episode is The Big Evans from Dragnet, their story from March 6, 1952.

Download CaseClosed729
